results.title: Recurrent early-onset severe obstetric cholestasis in a patient with two variants in the ABCB4 gene
results.text_hl: The etiology of @<m>DISEASE_Intrahepatic_Cholestasis_of_Pregnancy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C535932 @@@ICP@@@ is complex and not fully understood; however, genetic analysis has identified a variety of different genes which may be implicated in the development of @<m>DISEASE_Intrahepatic_Cholestasis_of_Pregnancy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C535932 @@@ICP@@@.

citations.NLM: Khattak MF, Thomson S. Recurrent early-onset severe obstetric cholestasis in a patient with two variants in the ABCB4 gene Hepatol Forum. 2023;4(3):142-144. PMID: 37822304

results.title: Metformin impairs bile acid homeostasis in ethinylestradiol-induced cholestasis in mice.
results.text_hl: Our results imply that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ should be used with caution in situations with hormone-dependent @DISEASE_Cholestasis @DISEASE_MESH:D002779 @@@cholestasis@@@, such as @<m>DISEASE_Intrahepatic_Cholestasis_of_Pregnancy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C535932 @@@ICP@@@.
